Pretty in Pink.story:
The lights burst, the room goes black. You blindly make MENOEUVRES IN THE DARK. The ORCHESTRAL score swells to a deafening level as a portal opens up.

"You'll be yourself again IF YOU LEAVE now. I'll always believe in you!"

THE END

Back to the Future.story:
Luckily, you didn't change your timeline and erase yourself or accidentally hook up with your mom.

In a burning streak of tires, you are shifted back into your own body, your own time. Maybe it was a just dream...

THE END

Napoleon Dynamite.pre: You're a perfect fit here in
Napoleon Dynamite.story:
Kip miraculously completes his mail-order time machine just before you have to feed Tina the llama. In an impossible feat of science, you hop in and fumble the controls back to your own timeline. Sweet!

THE END

Buffy the Vampire Slayer.story:
You ended up in Buffy's prom episode.

As a vampire suddenly attacks you through the window, you get sucked into a dimensional vortex and end up back in your own body. Whew, close call!

THE END

Mean Girls.story:
Out of the blue a school bus slams into you. Thankfully you wake again back inside your own body, your real life.

Although you wish you kept the tiara as a souvenir, you're relieved to have escaped those cliques.

THE END
Mean Girls.X_story:
You could not be more relieved when you're suddenly whisked back into your own body, back to your real life, though you wish you couldn've kept a piece of the tiara as a souvenir. Suffering from flashbacks of high school cliques yet?

THE END

Not Another Teen Movie.story:
Since you simultaneously fit and defy every teen movie stereotype, determining the movie was really difficult. How do you feel about that? Doesn't really matter now, back you go!

THE END

strings.common_end_message: Did you end up discovering your true self? Maybe your teenage years were more formative than you realized.

strings.err_invalid_input: Select from one of the listed options.

answers.text: An ugly duckling who worships me.
A crazy-haired genius.
Just as awkward as me. They deserve a vote of confidence.
I do better with animals. I just don't get humans.

questions_answers.question: The love of your life is...?

answers.text: Part Miami Vice, part shy computer geek, 100% romantic.
My own impossibly young mother. Or at least *she* thinks so!
Totally unaware of my feelings. Ugh, why's it so complicated? Gosh!
Mother Nature and all of her endangered creatures.

questions_answers.question: When you're face to face with trouble, what do you do?

answers.text: Cry a little but eventually overcome it.
Throw a sucker punch and run away.
Have my grandma fight for me. She's a rebel.
Level-headedly formulate a plan and solve it.

questions_answers.question: What do you say when something is really good?

answers.text: Hot. White hot.
An absolute dream!
Sweeeet!
So fetch.

questions_answers.question: You keep your friends close, and your enemies...

answers.text: At arm's length with your incisive retorts. You cut deep.
Buried under a load of manure. Now everyone can laugh at them.
Defeated by your strength of a grizzly, the reflexes of a puma, and the wisdom of a man.
Splattered against the blunt, business end of a speeding bus.

questions_answers.question: What does high school represent to you?

answers.text: Battle grounds for midwestern class warfare.
A quaint, rosy vision of a time past.
The apex of my potential. I am a legend (in my own mind).
The wild African savannas. You have to claw your way to the top.

questions_answers.question: What's the car of your dreams?

answers.text: A thrify but unique Volkswagen Karmann-Ghia Coupe.
A tricked out DMC with gull-wing doors, custom electronics, and modified fuel.
My best friend's cousin's sweet, sweet lowrider.
I'd rather not pollute, but if I had to pick one, a Prius.

questions_answers.question: What are you wearing to the big dance?

answers.text: A one of a kind, hand-upcycled, vintage piece that says, "Accept me for who I am."
Think rock & roll meets business casual.
A thrift shop find in multiple shades of burnt umber and powder blue. Snazzy.
Mathlete-flavored varsity-couture with an air of "Who, me?"
